```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tigerstats)
library(tidyverse)
```

at https://gss.norc.org/get-the-data/spss download the zip file 2018.spss.zip

Upload the zip file; it comes in as a .sav file;


```{r}
library(foreign)
# put data set name in the read
GPSS <- read.spss("dataset.sav", use.value.label=TRUE, to.data.frame=TRUE)
```


## print RACE and CAPPUN

```{r}
GPSS$RACE
GPSS$CAPPUN
```
Both variables are categorical; load the appropriate helper file
Notice that there are <NA> entries; remove these 

```{r}
table1 = xtabs(~CAPPUN + RACE, na.action = 'na.omit', drop.unused.levels=T, data=GPSS)
table1
```
